You may not use the Site in any way or engage in any conduct that: is unlawful, illegal or unauthorized; is defamatory of any other person; is obscene, sexually explicit, or offensive; advertises or promotes any other product or business (except for permitted advertising under separate written agreement with us); is likely to harass, upset, embarrass, alarm, or annoy any other person; is likely to disrupt our Site in any way; or promotes discrimination based on race, sex, religion, nationality, disability, sexual orientation, gender identity, or age; infringes any copyright, trademark, trade secret, or other proprietary right of any other person; or advocates, promotes or assists any violence or any unlawful act. Â Eligibility to Use the Site You must meet certain eligibility requirements to use the Site and access the Content and the services offered through the Site. In general, you must be a minimum of eighteen (18) years old and have legal capacity to enter into and bind yourself to legal contracts. You are deemed to have legal capacity if you have reached the age of majority in your state of residence and have the capability and power under the law of yours tate of residence to enter a legally binding contract. â Other Terms and Conditions Additional terms and conditions may apply to purchases of goods or services and to specific portions or features of the Site, including VIP reservations, Bottle/Table Service and Tickets purchases, promotions or other similar features when ever offered through the Site, all of which terms are made a part of these Terms of Use by this reference. You agree to abide by such other terms and conditions,including where applicable representing that you are of sufficient legal age to use or participate in such service or feature. If there is a conflict between these Terms of Use and the terms posted for or applicable to a specific portion of the Site or for any service offered on or through the Site, the latter terms shall control with respect to your use of that portion of the Site or the specific service. â A.Â Â Â Â VIP Reservations â Bottle/Table Service You may be able to make a Bottle/Table Service reservation through the Site at one of the DAER locations by clicking on the BookVIP menu and selecting one of the offered venues (DAER Nightclub, DAER Dayclub or Rooftop Live), the desired event and day of the event. You will be directed to a third-party booking engine to complete the reservation. All terms and conditions of your reservation will be set forth on the reservation page forthat booking engine, including cancellation policies and only those terms will apply to your reservation. You will be required to enter a valid credit card number to complete your transaction, as well as provide personal information including your name, address, and other contact information, all of which is processed by the third-party booking engine and solely subject to their privacy policy. Please note that your personal information, limited to contact details,will be provided to the DAER location where you made your reservation only for the purpose of managing your reservation, check you in when you arrive at the venue and for records purposes. Â B.Â Â Â Â VIP Reservations â Tickets Purchase You may be able to purchase Ticket/s for an eventhosted at one of the DAER locations by clicking on the Book VIP menu and selecting one of the offered venues (DAER Nightclub, DAER Dayclub or Rooftop Live), the desired event and day of the event. You will be directed to a third-party website where you can complete your purchase. All terms and conditions of your purchase will be set forth on the reservation page of such third-party website, including cancellation policies. Only those terms and conditions will apply to your transaction. You will be required to enter a valid credit card number to complete your transaction, as well as provide personal information including your name, address, and other contact information, all of which is processed by the third-party website and solely subject to their privacy policy. Please note that your personal information, limited to contact details,will be provided to the DAER location that will host the event for which you purchased the Ticket and only for the purpose of managing your purchase, check you in when you arrive at the venue and for records purposes. â Privacy DAERâs Privacy Policy applies to use of this Site, and its terms are made a part of these Terms of Use by this reference. A link to DAERâs Privacy Policy can be found in the footer of this Site as well as here â Links to Other Sites This Site may contain links to other independent third-party Web sites ("Linked Sites"). These Linked Sites are provided solely as a convenience to our visitors and to allow you to complete your transactions. Such Linked Sites are not under SHRSSâs control, and SHRSS is not responsible for and does not endorse the content of such Linked Sites, including any information or materials contained on such Linked Sites. You will need to make your own independent judgment regarding your interaction with these Linked Sites and carefully read the Linked Sitesâ privacy policy and terms of use. â Disclaimers SHRSS DOES NOT PROMISE THAT THE SITE OR ANY CONTENT, SERVICE OR FEATURE OF THE SITE WILL BE ERROR-FREE OR UNINTERRUPTED, OR THAT ANY DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, ORTHAT YOUR USE OF THE SITE WILL PROVIDE SPECIFIC RESULTS. Introduced by Hard Rock Hotel & Casino and the Guitar Hotel, these explosive destinations ensure unforgettable moments. â DAER NIGHTCLUB and the all new DAER DAYCLUB redefines the nightlife and day life event scene with top producers and live performances. Introduced by Hard Rock Hotel & Casino and the Guitar Hotel, these explosive destinations ensure unforgettable moments, day or night. â DAER mirrors the most popular club trends from Los Angeles, New York, Las Vegas and beyond with two Nightclub venues in South Florida. â DAER venues feature cutting-edge audio visual technology, elevated bottle service and a carefully curated lineup of the world's most sought-after DJs and live artists. DAER Nightclub/Dayclub is redefining nightlife and creating the ultimate Dayclub experience. â rental information and pdf deck download rental pdf Venue Information â 1 Lucky St, Hollywood, FL 33314 Telephone: +1 954-779-4750 â Hours of Operation DAER Dayclub Saturday | Sunday â 12PM â Sunset DAER Nightclub Friday | Saturday â 10PM â 4AM â Rooftop Live Friday & Saturday â 8PM â 2AM â VENUE Located inside The Guitar Hotel at Hard Rock Hotel & Casino Hollywood, Florida. Enter through Lucky Street Garage and valet, located inside the retail corridor. â Audio/Visual State of the art, award winning Dynacord Sound System equipped for a DJ and Live performances. Over 50 fixtures of intelligent lighting with gobo placement capabilities. LED color mixing domed rooftop and 11 in-house video screens for large scale video projections. Team Members - Hard Rock Stadium Parking at the stadium is sold out.  Park & Ride passes still available! ✕ Skip to content Search for: STADIUM CONCESSIONS NEWS & MEDIA CONTACT EVENTS LUXURY & SUITES PLAN YOUR VISIT TRANSPORTATION A-Z GUIDE OFFICIAL APP SEATING CHART STADIUM POLICIES TAILGATING GUIDELINES MY TICKETS Host Your Event Team Members Zachri Hall 2024-07-03T15:02:41-04:00 PART-TIME OPPORTUNITIES Come join our team as we continue to evolve as a global entertainment destination. Our team members have the opportunity to create lifelong memories and friendships with staff and guests through the multitude of events we host. From Miami Dolphins football, University of Miami Hurricanes football, to the Miami Open, Soccer, Concerts, and the Formula 1 Crypto.com Miami Grand Prix there is so much to experience working with our team. We strive to provide excellent service as we carry through OUR PROMISE to CARE, KNOW and CONNECT. See below for more information on the opportunities currently available to become a Hard Rock Stadium team member. For information on our part-time opportunities, visit our TeamWork Online page. GUEST EXPERIENCE The Guest Experience team is a fan facing event day position. As a guest experience representative, you would have the opportunity to interact with guests from around the world to help create positive memories here at Hard Rock Stadium. Guest Experience interacts with guests throughout their journey in the stadium making sure they have a great time along the way. Click the video to see what position would work best for you. PARKING The Hard Rock Stadium Parking team is a fan facing transportation operations team. The parking team consists of three positions ready to start off a great experience. As a parking team representative, you would set the tone for each fan’s visit to Hard Rock Stadium and seal the memories with a fond farewell. Click the video to see what the parking team is all about. GUEST EXPERIENCE For information on our paid 10-week Summer Internship Program, visit miamidolphins.com/careers/internship PARKING For information on our paid 10-week Summer Internship Program, visit miamidolphins.com/careers/internship Proud Home Of HARD ROCK STADIUM 347 Don Shula Drive Miami Gardens, Florida 33056 (305) 943-8000 guestexperience@hardrockstadium.com GENERAL Main Phone Number 305-943-8000 Special Events Bookings 305-943-6311 Ticket Office 305-943-6678 Team Store 305-943-7980 MORE PRIVACY POLICY TERMS AND CONDITIONS ACCESSIBILITY EMPLOYMENT Opt Out of Information Collection @ 2025 South Florida Stadium LLC. DAER Nightclub Miami | Info, Reviews, Events & Reservations | Nox Miami Best Places Guides Reservations Concierge Membership Partner with us D Deutsch E English E Español F Français I Italiano P Português S Svenska Sign up D Deutsch E English E Español F Français I Italiano P Português S Svenska Miami DAER Nightclub DAER Nightclub Miami Book now Photo credits: DAER Nightclub Miami 4.3 ( 107 reviews ) DAER Nightclub Miami club DAER Miami is a top spot for an exciting night in the city. It's one of Miami's most happening places, buzzing with energy every night. Walking towards its location at 1 Lucky Street Miami gets you pumped for the fun ahead. Once inside, you're hit with the vibe of the music. DAER boasts a fancy look with comfy sofas, warm lights, and modern style. Thanks to high-tech LED lights and famous SJ Lighting, it's a go-to for music lovers and thrill-seekers. The music at DAER has something for everyone, with top local talent from South Florida playing on Friday and Saturday nights at Rooftop Live. The awesome sound system and 40-foot LED screen DJ booth keep the dance floor lively. The place is electric, with people enjoying the tunes and performances. DAER attracts a mix of young pros and experienced jetsetters. Its indoor-outdoor space is great for parties , sports watching, or just hanging out with friends. In short, DAER Nightclub is where you want to be in Miami for a memorable night. With its cool vibe, great music, and fun crowd, it's a must-visit in South Florida. Written by Carlos Rivera - Updated on 8/17/2025 Photos of DAER Nightclub +7 photos Why book DAER Nightclub with Nox Priority Access Save time and effort, we handle all for you. High-End Concierge Get personalized itineraries for your dream getaway. Global Presence Access luxury experiences worldwide. Next Events DAER Nightclub Thursday Thursday, September 11, 22:00 - 04:00 Request Now DAER Nightclub Friday Friday, September 12, 22:00 - 04:00 Request Now DAER Nightclub Saturday Saturday, September 13, 22:00 - 04:00 Request Now Information 1 Lucky Street, 33314 Miami EDM Minimum Age: 21 Opening Hours Thursday 22:00 - 04:00 Friday 22:00 - 04:00 Saturday 22:00 - 04:00 Contact Reservations Website Instagram Facebook Frequently Asked Questions Which days is DAER Nightclub open? DAER Nightclub Miami welcomes you on Thursday, Friday, Saturday (22:00 - 04:00). Where is located DAER Nightclub Miami? The address of DAER Nightclub is 1 Lucky Street, 33314, Miami. How is DAER Nightclub Miami rated? DAER Nightclub Miami is rated 4.3 by 107 users. Check the reviews to discover what people love the most about DAER Nightclub. What kind of musics is played at DAER Nightclub? The music at DAER Nightclub Miami is EDM. What is the dress code of DAER Nightclub Miami? The dress code is smart & elegant. How to get into DAER Nightclub Miami? At door discretion. The best way to ensure entry is to book a table. Remember, the dress code is smart & elegant. How to book a table at DAER Nightclub Miami? Booking a table at DAER Nightclub is simple and easy. Just fill out the form including when you want to visit and how many people are in your party, and our concierge will help you secure the best table. Make sure to reserve your table at least 24 hours in advance, especially for weekend nights, as tables sell out quickly. You may also like El Santo Don Diablo 4.6 Fri Sat E11even 4.6 Mon Wed hits Mr Jones 4.5 Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat hits MAD CLUB Wynwood 4.5 Thu Fri Sat hits El Patio Wynwood 4.5 Sun Thu Fri Sat latino The Ground at Space 4.4 hits La Playa Dayclub 4.4 Sun Fri Sat hits Sway Nightclub 4.4 Thu Fri Sat hits M2 Nightclub 4.3 Fri Sat hits Mandrake 4.3 Wed Thu Fri Sat EDM, hits Treehouse 4.3 Sun Thu Fri Sat EDM Do Not Sit 4.3 Wed Thu Fri Sat house, EDM See All Book now About Concierge Membership Business NOX curates and reviews exceptional dining experiences worldwide.
